list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Update log file path in Logger.cpp
The path to the log file has been updated in Logger.cpp, changing from '/logs' directory to '/log'. This change harmonizes naming conventions across the codebase and centralizes all log files in one place for easy access and management.

task.summary:
Remove Sqlite3 dependencies
Remove Sqlite3 dependencies to prepare for move to MongoDB.

Add 'logs/' to .gitignore
An update has been made on the .gitignore file, adding 'logs/' to it. This change will prevent Git from tracking the logs directory and its files, useful for maintaining a cleaner repository.

Update project name in .idea/.name file
The name of the project in the .idea/.name file has been changed from 'Uni-Aufgaben' to 'Ergos'. This represents a change in the project's focus or direction.

Simplify module type in ERGOS.iml
The ERGOS.iml file has been simplified to only specify the module classpath and type. This change removes unnecessary definitions such as 'NewModuleRootManager' and 'orderEntry', streamlining the project structure.

Add misc.xml to .idea directory
The new misc.xml file has been added to the .idea directory. This file comprises the main "project" component for CMakeWorkspace, streamlining the structure and hierarchy of the project itself.

Update .gitignore with new files
New files namely 'tmp' and '.env' have been added to .gitignore. Furthermore, the 'logs' entry has been corrected to 'log'. This ensures appropriate ignoring of temporary, environment and log files by Git.

Add new submodule 'libs/vcpkg'
A new submodule 'libs/vcpkg' has been added to the repository. The submodule path is set to 'libs/vcpkg' and the URL points to the 'vcpkg' repository on GitHub.

Add cmake.xml with multiple build configurations
The new file '.idea/cmake.xml' has been added, which includes a configuration for various build profiles. This addition will allow a more streamlined and efficient development process, especially when switching between different build configurations such as Debug, Release, and Minimum Size Release for various development platforms (Visual Studio, WSL, MinGW, System).

Remove 'libraries/CMakeLists.txt' file
The 'libraries/CMakeLists.txt' file has been deleted. This file removal is part of streamlining the build configuration, where multiple build profiles have been set up in a new '.idea/cmake.xml' file instead. This new setting should make switching between different build configurations more efficient.

Add new '.idea/cmake.xml' file and remove 'libraries/CMakeLists.txt'
The new '.idea/cmake.xml' file has been added to set up multiple build profiles, thereby streamlining the build configuration process. This change not only makes 'libraries/CMakeLists.txt' redundant, but also allows for an efficient switch between different build configurations.

Update CMakeLists.txt, add env loader, Mongo driver
CMakeLists.txt has been updated to include a module for environment variable loading and the MongoDB C++ driver. Additionally, required library paths have been adjusted and unnecessary flags have been removed to streamline the build process. This update facilitates easier configuration and smoother transition between different build configurations.

Add SonarLintModuleSettings option to ERGOS.iml
The ERGOS.iml file has been updated to include a SonarLintModuleSettings component with a unique ID. This addition is expected to enhance linting process and improve code quality check.

Add load_env function in cmake
Introduced a new function 'load_env' in freshly created 'loadEnv.cmake' file. This new function reads a file and for each line not starting with a comment, it replaces spaces with nothing, splits the line on '=', and sets an environment variable with the parsed values. This addition will improve environment setup convenience.

Remove old log file
The log file 'log_2024-01-17.txt' was deleted from the codebase. This old log file isn't needed anymore as it mostly contained debug and routine information trace steps, keeping the repository clean and relevant.

MESSAGE.value:
Remove Sqlite3 dependencies
Remove Sqlite3 dependencies to prepare for move to MongoDB.

Add 'logs/' to .gitignore
An update has been made on the .gitignore file, adding 'logs/' to it. This change will prevent Git from tracking the logs directory and its files, useful for maintaining a cleaner repository.

Update project name in .idea/.name file
The name of the project in the .idea/.name file has been changed from 'Uni-Aufgaben' to 'Ergos'. This represents a change in the project's focus or direction.

Simplify module type in ERGOS.iml
The ERGOS.iml file has been simplified to only specify the module classpath and type. This change removes unnecessary definitions such as 'NewModuleRootManager' and 'orderEntry', streamlining the project structure.

Add misc.xml to .idea directory
The new misc.xml file has been added to the .idea directory. This file comprises the main "project" component for CMakeWorkspace, streamlining the structure and hierarchy of the project itself.

Add .env file with MongoDB connection string
A new .env file has been created which contains the MongoDB connection string. The credentials and parameters are included in the string. A "test" setting has also been added.

Update .gitignore with new files
New files namely 'tmp' and '.env' have been added to .gitignore. Furthermore, the 'logs' entry has been corrected to 'log'. This ensures appropriate ignoring of temporary, environment and log files by Git.

Add new submodule 'libs/vcpkg'
A new submodule 'libs/vcpkg' has been added to the repository. The submodule path is set to 'libs/vcpkg' and the URL points to the 'vcpkg' repository on GitHub.

Add cmake.xml with multiple build configurations
The new file '.idea/cmake.xml' has been added, which includes a configuration for various build profiles. This addition will allow a more streamlined and efficient development process, especially when switching between different build configurations such as Debug, Release, and Minimum Size Release for various development platforms (Visual Studio, WSL, MinGW, System).

Remove 'libraries/CMakeLists.txt' file
The 'libraries/CMakeLists.txt' file has been deleted. This file removal is part of streamlining the build configuration, where multiple build profiles have been set up in a new '.idea/cmake.xml' file instead. This new setting should make switching between different build configurations more efficient.

Add new '.idea/cmake.xml' file and remove 'libraries/CMakeLists.txt'
The new '.idea/cmake.xml' file has been added to set up multiple build profiles, thereby streamlining the build configuration process. This change not only makes 'libraries/CMakeLists.txt' redundant, but also allows for an efficient switch between different build configurations.

Update CMakeLists.txt, add env loader, Mongo driver
CMakeLists.txt has been updated to include a module for environment variable loading and the MongoDB C++ driver. Additionally, required library paths have been adjusted and unnecessary flags have been removed to streamline the build process. This update facilitates easier configuration and smoother transition between different build configurations.

Add SonarLintModuleSettings option to ERGOS.iml
The ERGOS.iml file has been updated to include a SonarLintModuleSettings component with a unique ID. This addition is expected to enhance linting process and improve code quality check.

Add load_env function in cmake
Introduced a new function 'load_env' in freshly created 'loadEnv.cmake' file. This new function reads a file and for each line not starting with a comment, it replaces spaces with nothing, splits the line on '=', and sets an environment variable with the parsed values. This addition will improve environment setup convenience.

Remove old log file
The log file 'log_2024-01-17.txt' was deleted from the codebase. This old log file isn't needed anymore as it mostly contained debug and routine information trace steps, keeping the repository clean and relevant.

Update log file path in Logger.cpp
The path to the log file has been updated in Logger.cpp, changing from '/logs' directory to '/log'. This change harmonizes naming conventions across the codebase and centralizes all log files in one place for easy access and management.
